DOC.brief_summary: Determine efficacy sub tenon kenalog injection post-operative management trabeculectomy procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Post-Operative Sub-Tenon Kenalog Glaucoma Filtering Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Postoperative sub-Tenon Triamcinolone Acetonide glaucoma filter surgery Objectives : Trabeculectomy surgical procedure design reduce internal eye pressure drain fluid within eye sub-conjunctival ( superficial eye lining ) space . Scar formation conjunctival Tenon 's capsule fibroblast proliferation represent common cause failure trabeculectomies . A number drug use prevent failure trabeculectomies scar process include intraoperative mitomycin C ( MMC ) preoperative Triamcinalone Acetonide ( TA ) . Over past several year , intraoperative MMC become preferred method prevent scar formation . This study look determine prospective , double-blind , randomized method long-term efficacy safety MMC postoperative TA compare standard practice intraoperative MMC postoperative prednisolone acetate drop prevent scar related failure trabeculectomies .
DOC.criteria: Trabeculectomy surgery patient , age 18 old Exclusion Criteria : Pregnant , nursing , age le 18 , know allergy medication study
